mapper.select: select a.TRPLC_NO, a.TRPLC_CTGRY, a.REG_DE, a.UPD_DE, a.TRPLC_DETAIL_CTGRY, a.LATI, a.LONGI, a.MNGR from TRPLC_INFO as a where a.TRPLC_NO = #{trplc_no}

select a.TRPLC_NO ,(select CODE_NM from CMMN_CODE where CODE_NO = a.TRPLC_NO ) as TRPLC_NM , a.TRPLC_CTGRY , a.REG_DE , a.UPD_DE , a.TRPLC_DETAIL_CTGRY , a.LATI , a.LONGI , a.MNGR from TRPLC_INFO a
where 1=1
and TRPLC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
and TRPLC_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}

select count((select CODE_NM from CMMN_CODE where CODE_NO = a.TRPLC_NO ) as TRPLC_NM, a.TRPLC_NO) from TRPLC_INFO as a where 1=1
and TRPLC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
and TRPLC_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
